|lang=en

|comments=
= //**SCP-7101** - Ms. Fortune// 
I wrote this in an incredible rush to get 8 endings done for the 7K Contest. This is not my finest work by any means, and I'd like to apologize profusely for the cringe you may experience. 

Good day. 

]]
